task.title: Deleting an LTPA profile by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can delete LTPA profiles by using the delete LTPAProfile command on the command line.

context.p: You can delete an LTPA profile by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to delete an LTPA profile, see .
context.note: You cannot delete an LTPA profile while it is associated with a security profile. First, remove the LTPA profile from the associated security profile by editing the security profile. Then, delete the LTPA profile.

step.cmd: To delete an LTPA profile, enter the following command:
step.info:
delete LTPAProfile "Name=name"Where:
name Specifies the name of the LTPA profile that you want to delete.
